name: Rail Rider: Train Driver Game
description:
Get ready for a breathtaking 3D adventure on a high-speed train. Rail Rider is a train simulation game full of drive and fun. Fast-paced journeys, beautiful locations, and thrilling railroad gameplay await you in the train game #1.

Imagine you are a train driver traveling all over the country. You have an important mission to shuttle commuters to work, school, or wherever they need to go. There’s no time to waste! Your passengers are already at a train station looking forward to your arrival!

Check out what this train game has in store for you:

• Engrossing train driving simulator
• Most addictive gameplay
• Awesome locations
• Ever-increasing complexity
• Cool 3D graphics

The rules of this arcade game are pretty simple. Your main goal is to stop at a spot where your passengers can most easily board or get off the train. It may sound easy, but it’s quite a challenge! If you stop too far away from the train yard, the annoyed commuters will refuse to get on the train. And if you go too far beyond the stop sign, your train will break down!

You need to reach the train station and brake in a way that stops your train right next to a stop sign. The better your braking, the more passengers you will get on board. Put your parking skills and reaction time to the test with this fun railroad game!

To pass a level, you need to get a specific number of passengers while traveling the railway. But once you make a mistake, you lose all your passengers and have to start that level over again.

Watch out for tricky turns, dead ends, and other fast trains on your way! The higher your level, the more difficult the obstacles you will encounter and the more commuters you’ll need to shuttle.
